title: I hired a travel advisor to coordinate my family's Paris vacation — I might never plan my own trips again
description: I enjoyed working with a travel advisor to plan a family trip to Paris. The hotel, restaurants, and experiences were amazing, and I was more present.

title: PSG consider Rashford swap deal - Sunday's gossip
description: Paris St-Germain might offer Manchester United a swap deal for Marcus Rashford, Liverpool will listen to offers for Ibrahima Konate, plus more.

title: Bird flu poses risk of pandemic worse than COVID, France's Institut Pasteur says
description: PARIS (Reuters) -The bird flu virus that has been spreading among wild birds, poultry and mammals could lead to a pandemic worse than COVID-19 if the virus mutates to transmit between ​humans, the head of France's Institut Pasteur respiratory infections centre said. The highly pathogenic avian influenza, commonly called bird ‌flu, has led to the culling of hundreds of millions of birds in the past few years, disrupting food supplies and driving up prices, though human infections ‌remain rare.

title: 'More identity' - Frank takes heart from Spurs defeat at PSG
description: Thomas Frank can take encouragement from some aspects of Spurs' latest display, despite defeat to Paris St-Germain, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: US set to narrow its rare earth gap, others not so much
description: PARIS/BEIJING (Reuters) -A multi-billion dollar pipeline of rare earth ​projects around the world is set to partly wean the U. off Chinese rare earths, but falls far short of breaking Beijing'‌s grip over the sector for most other countries.

title: Here are the 20 best cities in the world to live in or visit
description: Resonance ranked the best cities in the world according to factors like livability, lovability, and prosperity. London, New York, Paris, and Tokyo fared best.

title: Diaz to miss Arsenal game after three-game ban for Hakimi challenge
description: Bayern Munich will be without Luis Diaz when they face Arsenal next week after the attacker receives a three-match ban for his red card against Paris St-Germain.
